verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 1:5
verses.text: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God, that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God, for which ye also suffer:

verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 1:6
verses.text: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you;

verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 1:7
verses.text: And to you who are troubled rest with us, when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels,

verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 1:8
verses.text: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God, and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ:
